name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BookmarkX - The place for all your x.com bookmarks.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your x.com bookmarks with tags, collections, notes, smart search, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best way to organize and explore your X.com bookmarks. Save, categorize, and rediscover your favorite content effortlessly with tags, collections, notes, and advanced search.

This extension keeps your saved posts at your fingertips, letting you create collections for different topics, tag posts for easy filtering, and add notes to capture key insights. Finding that one post you bookmarked weeks ago is now simple and fast.

Whether youâ€™re curating inspiration, research, or just organizing your saved content, BookmarkX brings order and ease to your bookmarks on X.com.
